metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4349 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in phpMyAdmin 4.1.xbefore 4.1.14.1 and 4.2.x before 4.2.4 allow remote authenticated users toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted table name that isimproperly handled after a (1) hide or (2) unhide action.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4349` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.2.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.2.5-1').
